title: Trudeau Announces MANDATORY VACCINES, Pfizer Scientist EXPOSED & NO VAX…NO CHURCH?!!!
cleaned_text:
As of the end of this month all federal employees working in Canada must get fully vaccinated or face being fired or put on unpaid leave. The Trudeau government said back in February that vaccines would NOT be made mandatory stating that “that’s not how we do things here in Canada”…fast forward 8 months and that’s now exactly how things are being done in Canada. Meanwhile Universities in Ontario are baring unvaxed students from taking ONLINE courses and in NFLD. & Labrador they are now considering vaccine passports as a requirement to attend church. In this video Dan Dicks of Press For Truth covers the latest Covid-19(84) news being vindicated once again when it comes to the global push for mandatory vaccines being enforced. 

 

WATCH ON ➜ ODYSEE
